title: 01/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The Eagles head coaching position is a bad job

-Alabama QB Mac Jones will only succeed in the NFL if he goes to a great situation

-We've seen enough from Tua for the Dolphins to move on

-The Herd Hierarchy: Colin ranks the eight teams remaining in the NFL playoffs

-The Steelers need to stop talking

-Grading the NFL head coaching openings


Guest: Jon Ritchie, former Eagles Fullback & Philadelphia Radio Host



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
